title: Drawing, Wallace K. Harrison House: Living Room, ca. 1931
title_raw: Wallace K. Harrison House: Living Room
medium: Graphite and orange color pencil on tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with descriptions, dimensions; inscribed in graphite, lower right: LIVING ROOM WALLACE HARRISON/FURNITURE SCHEDULE/SOFA 1/ UPH. CHAIR/LOVE SEAT 1/DESK CHAIR 1/SIDE CHAIR 1/DESK 1/TABLE 1/END TABLE 2/SIDE TABLE 1/PIANO 1/BOOK CASE 1/FIRE PLACE 1/TABLE LAMP 5/DESK LAMP 1/FLOOR LAMP 1/CARPET 20'-DIAM. 1
description: Plan and elevations for circular living room for Harrison house. Entrance at lower right, grand piano, side chair, piano lamp, and easy chair with end table at right of entrance. Four-seat sofa along upper right wall, flanked by end table and lamp at each side. Circular coffee table in front of sofa with two small easy chairs facing sofa. Table against wall at left of entrance near lower right with small arm chair facing piano. Fireplace along lower left wall, with two large easy chairs and round table and lamp facing small love seat and endtable and lamp. Open bookshelf along wall to right of fireplace; desk and small desk chair to right of bookshelf. Large circular carpet at center of room. Smaller circular room adjacent to larger room at upper right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Wallace K. Harrison House: Living Room, ca. 1931. Graphite and orange color pencil on tracing paper. 
Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-454
